def onInit(eventType, eventData, quest, processor): for event in events.iterkeys(): processor.subscribe(event, quest) return True
def onFinishBattle(eventType, eventData, quest, processor): questProgress = quest_progress.BaseQuestProgress(quest.config, processor.getQuestProgress(quest.progressID))

events = { QUEST_EVENT_TYPE.INIT: onInit, QUEST_EVENT_TYPE.FINISH_BATTLE: onFinishBattle, }
def quest(eventType, eventData, quest, processor): LOG('QUEST EVENT:', eventType, quest.id) return events.get(eventType, lambda *args: False)(eventType, eventData, quest, processor)
